meanings.definition: Very small or tiny in size or amount.
meanings.sent1: The eensiest kitten in the litter was so adorable.
meanings.sent2: She found the eensiest seashell on the beach.
meanings.sent3: The eensiest cupcake at the party disappeared in a single bite.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as eensiest as a whisper in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The eensiest star in the sky twinkled faintly.

meanings.definition: To a very small extent or degree.
meanings.sent1: He only eensiest touched the fragile vase.
meanings.sent2: She eensiest glanced at the clock before leaving.
meanings.sent3: The cat eensiest pounced on the unsuspecting mouse.
meanings.sent4: His interest in the topic was eensiest compared to the others.
meanings.sent5: The flower eensiest wilted under the scorching sun.
